actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish the Privacy Protection Study commission to evaluate the efficacy of the Freedom of Information Act and the Electronic Freedom of Information Act Amendments of 1996, to determine whether new laws are necessary, and to provide advice and recommendations.
short_title: Privacy Protection Study Commission Act of 1999
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Privacy Protection Study Commission Act of 1999 - Establishes the Privacy Protection Study Commission to investigate and report to Congress on matters relating to the Freedom of Information Act and the implementation of the Electronic Freedom of Information Act Amendments of 1996. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Privacy Protection Study Commission Act of 1999

A bill to establish the Privacy Protection Study commission to evaluate the efficacy of the Freedom of Information Act and the Electronic Freedom of Information Act Amendments of 1996, to determine whether new laws are necessary, and to provide advice and recommendations.
